channel.title: Pages on James Horton
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on James Horton

item.title: About
item.description:
So I’m an Electronic Engineer, who now spends most of his time doing DSP and Signal processing at work. I spend a lot of time working with MATLAB and Simulink in my day job as a “Systems Engineer” for a defence company. Outside of work you will find my experimenting with Software Defined Radio (SDR), open source FPGA boards, and 3D Printing.

I studied Electronic Engineering at University of Surrey in Guildford, and graduated in 2013. In my free time I enjoy Kayaking, and Mountain Biking. A new sport I have recently taken up is indoor rock climbing.

I’ve recently started trying to put more of my little home projects up on github, as a way to encourage me to finish some of them, we will see if I’m successful and the graph above becomes a bit more green. My github stats are also shown bellow using GitHub Readme Stats.
